title: Before issuance of Occupation Certificate, the Authority shall endorse on the DRC, in writing in fig
clause_text: Before issuance of Occupation Certificate, the Authority shall endorse on the DRC, in writing in figures and words, the quantum of TDR / DRs actually used and the balance remaining, if any

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Before issuance of Occupation Certificate, the Authority shall endorse on the DRC, in writing in figures and words, the quantum of TDR / DRs actually used and the balance remaining, if any
